long_description: The women's REI Winterflyte Henley top lets you explores cross-country trails in warm, moisture-wicking, stretch performance fabric and a Henley neckline with snap-placket. Polyester fabric wicks moisture to keep skin dry and moves with you thanks to its 4-way stretch. Raglan sleeves with light fabric gathering at shoulders enhance range of motion. Front and back princess seams offer a flattering look. The women's REI Winterflyte Henley top features an active fit that provides a full range of motion. Reflective details enhance visibility in dim light; 26 in. back length.
short_description: The women's REI Winterflyte Henley top lets you explores cross-country trails in warm, moisture-wicking, stretch performance fabric and a Henley neckline with snap-placket.
